CHAT.comment: DEAR. AARON , HOW RAE you? I AM FINE. I L (backward) u , BEST (the B is backward). Like Chi.
after Chi wrote I L u to represent I like you , he added the word Like under the L as a correction.

not sure how it was decided to write to Aaron , tape starts after they decide. After negotiating which way to write on the (unlined) paper Mot dictates first two lines. Chi comes up with the last line on his own (after Mot has decided that it's time to sign the letter and be done with it); Mot helps with most of the spelling and punctuation. Bro is disruptive throughout the writing process

u.a: crosses out y and writes u@l
scolds Bro , tells to get out
responding to Chi writing I and backward L
writes (I L u) to represent (I like you)
tells Bro to stop making noise in the background .
BRO is rustling paper or plastic in the background
BRO making noise in the background again
starts to write (like) under (I L u)
BRO kisses EXP on the cheek
points to the b on the Bic pen
BRO is giggling in the background
